description:
gotest: correct the documentation of -parallel.
It said the default was zero, but it's actually $GOMAXPROCS.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

assuming this is in fact the true

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ceb8b9904cc4 ***

gotest: correct the documentation of -parallel.
It said the default was zero, but it's actually $GOMAXPROCS.

R=golang-dev, gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5229059

>

subject: code review 5229059: gotest: correct the documentation of -parallel.
